mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_master_table (dmt_id, VoltageA_1, Electric_currentA_1, Host_temperature_1, Sump_Pressure_1, Coolant_temperature_1, Loading_pressure_1, Unloading_pressure_1, Exhaust_pressure_1, Exhaust_temperature_1, total_energy_1, VoltageA_2, Electric_currentA_2, Host_temperature_2, Sump_Pressure_2, Coolant_temperature_2, Loading_pressure_2, Unloading_pressure_2, Exhaust_pressure_2, Exhaust_temperature_2, total_energy_2, VoltageA_3, Electric_currentA_3, Host_temperature_3, Sump_Pressure_3, Coolant_temperature_3, Loading_pressure_3, Unloading_pressure_3, Exhaust_pressure_3, Exhaust_temperature_3, total_energy_3, Active_Service_Rate1, Active_Service_Rate2, Active_Service_Rate3, pressure, Cumulative_flow, Loading_time_1, Alarm_number_1, Control_state_1, Warning_sign_1, Running_time_1, Remote_switch_1, Loading_time_2, Alarm_number_2, Control_state_2, Warning_sign_2, Running_time_2, Remote_switch_2, Loading_time_3, Alarm_number_3, Control_state_3, Warning_sign_3, Running_time_3, Remote_switch_3 ) VALUES (NULL, #{VoltageA_1}, #{Electric_currentA_1}, #{Host_temperature_1}, #{Coolant_temperature_1}, #{Sump_Pressure_1}, #{Loading_pressure_1}, #{Unloading_pressure_1}, #{Exhaust_pressure_1}, #{Exhaust_temperature_1}, #{total_energy_1}, #{VoltageA_2}, #{Electric_currentA_2}, #{Host_temperature_2}, #{Coolant_temperature_2}, #{Sump_Pressure_2}, #{Loading_pressure_2}, #{Unloading_pressure_2}, #{Exhaust_pressure_2}, #{Exhaust_temperature_2}, #{total_energy_2}, #{VoltageA_3}, #{Electric_currentA_3}, #{Host_temperature_3}, #{Coolant_temperature_3}, #{Sump_Pressure_3}, #{Loading_pressure_3}, #{Unloading_pressure_3}, #{Exhaust_pressure_3}, #{Exhaust_temperature_3}, #{total_energy_3}, #{Active_Service_Rate1}, #{Active_Service_Rate2}, #{Active_Service_Rate3}, #{pressure}, #{Cumulative_flow}, #{Loading_time_1}, #{Alarm_number_1}, #{Control_state_1}, #{Warning_sign_1}, #{Running_time_1}, #{Remote_switch_1}, #{Loading_time_2}, #{Alarm_number_2}, #{Control_state_2}, #{Warning_sign_2}, #{Running_time_2}, #{Remote_switch_2}, #{Loading_time_3}, #{Alarm_number_3}, #{Control_state_3}, #{Warning_sign_3}, #{Running_time_3}, #{Remote_switch_3} );
